com.googlecode.aluminumproject.expressions.el
Class ElContext

java.lang.Object
  javax.el.ELContext
      com.googlecode.aluminumproject.expressions.el.ElContext

public class ElContext
extends ELContext

An EL context that is based upon a context.

The following EL resolvers, which are all read-only, are used:

  • An implicit object EL resolver;
  • A context variable EL resolver;
  • An array EL resolver;
  • A list EL resolver;
  • A map EL resolver;
  • A resource bundle EL resolver.
  • A bean EL resolver.

It is possible to add custom EL resolvers by supplying configuration parameters that are named "expressions.el.resolvers_without_base.packages" or "expressions.el.resolvers_with_base.packages": the EL resolvers that are encountered in these comma-separated lists of packages and are not annotated with @Ignored are added at the head and tail of the resolver list, respectively.

Field Summary
static String EL_RESOLVER_WITH_BASE_PACKAGES
          The name of the configuration parameter that contains a comma-separated list of packages that should be scanned for custom EL resolvers that operate on a base object.
static String EL_RESOLVER_WITHOUT_BASE_PACKAGES
          The name of the configuration parameter that contains a comma-separated list of packages that should be scanned for custom EL resolvers that provide a base object.
